data.actual_result: Only the second permission is executed. the first one doesn't change.
data.short_description: In role settings, clicking on one permission and then quickly clicking on another role (while the first one is not yet selected), causes the first one to get unselected.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server > Server settings. - Click on a role. - Select/unselecte 2 permission really fast. - Observe.
